title: Behind the Insurrections - Hitler's Munich Beer Hall Putsch, Part 1
itunes:title: Behind the Insurrections - Hitler's Munich Beer Hall Putsch, Part 1
description:
We continue our study of fascist insurrections with the most famous of them all: Hitler's disastrous beer hall putsch.

Footnotes: 

  1. https://famous-trials.com/hitler/2524-the-hitler-beer-hall-putsch-trial-an-account 
  2. https://www.spiegel.de/international/germany/adolf-hitler-s-time-in-jail-flowers-for-the-fuehrer-in-landsberg-prison-a-702159.html
  3. https://www.thoughtco.com/hitlers-beer-hall-putsch-1778295
  4. https://ufdc.ufl.edu/AA00003880/00001/pdf
  5. https://www.amazon.com/dp/B06XHJ8685/ref=dp-kindle-redirect?_encoding=UTF8&btkr=1 
  6. https://www.amazon.com/1924-Year-That-Made-Hitler-ebook/dp/B011J4H47W
